msContents.summary: Hālāsyamāhātmya is part of the Skandapurāṇa. It contains the story about Viśvanātha śiva. The available edition of this text is with the Mīnākṣistuti. Front cover has a line written in the Telugu script. Second folio after the guard folio is damaged. Last folio unnumbered.

msItem.title: Hālāsyamāhātmya
msItem.rubric: 1v 1 śuklāṃbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye .. vāgarthāviva saṃpṛktau vāgarthapratipattaye . jagatapi 1v 2 tarau vande pārvatiparameśvarau ..
msItem.incipit: 1v 2 mātāmahamahāśailaṃ mahastapitāhaṃ kāraṇanjagatāṃ vande ka?duparihāraṇaṃ .. kāruṇyamadaniṣyandaṃ kaivalya 1v 3 vanacāriṇaṃ . kālāṃbudaśyāmalāṅgaṃ kalabhānanamāśraye .. āmnāyacalamañcasthamānaneṣaḍbhiranvitaṃ . himādristanayāstanyakukṣiṃ bharimu
msItem.explicit: 263v 5 tu sarvasya bhavatātcchivaṃ . iti saṃprārthya sarvajñassūtassarvamuniśvarān . kṛpādṛṣṭyānugṛhyātha śivadhyānaparo bhavat .. 263v 6 iti śrīskānde purāṇe agastyasaṃhitāyāṃ hālāsyamāhātyme agastyavasiṣṭhādyanantamunivarairānandavanāt ..
msItem.finalRubric: 264r 3 psitaṃ . kṣetraṃ hi hālāsyamidaṃ pavitraṃ gātraṃ vahantyate vatā ? gātraṃ . gātraṃ yadi syātadayunmanetraṃ gotrānmajāko magātra 264r 4 miśraṃ . namostu tasmai madhurānagadhyai hemābjīni sat sarasyai . 264r 4 namostu devyai śaparekṣaṇāyai namo 264r 5 stu saukhyāśvaralīṅgamuktyai .. hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu mīnākṣīsahāyaṃ 264r 6 karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ ..

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 5 blank folio and 264 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin of the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Fungus spot in the right margin on 264r. Second folio after the guard folio is damaged. remaining folio are in good condition.
